name: G-Max Steelsurge
effect: The Steel-type user can choose to use this instead of Max Steelspike while Dynamaxed. Mutually exclusive with other G-Max moves. Deals the base move's damage + 2 to a single enemy. Additionally, set up Sharp Spikes on the foe's side of the battlefield.
description: The user throws huge spikes of steel at the foe, shattering on impact and leaving the ground a minefield of sharp steel spikes.
